body.name: Emma 3-in-1 Convertible Toddler Bed in Espresso, Converts to Two Chairs and-Table, Low to Floor Design, JPMA Certified, Non-Toxic Finishes, Safety Rails

features: CONVENIENT TRANSITION BED: The Emma 3-in-1 Convertible Toddler Bed sports a low-to-floor & patented design making it easy for your child to get in and out of bed. The bed comes with four wooden safety side rails and is reinforced for stability with center legs

3-in-1 CONVERTIBILITY: The Emma converts easily from a toddler bed into two child-sized chairs/sofas and a table that complement any room setting. Little wonder then that it was voted the BEST CONVERTIBLE of 2020 by parenting.com

BEAUTIFUL AESTHETICS: Whether you want a traditional toddler room or a modern one, the elegant Emma fits in easily with its sleigh design featuring smooth, flowing lines and gentle curves. Built of New Zealand pinewood, it is available in non-toxic brilliant finishes

SAFETY FOCUS: All our products are designed with the safety of your children in mind. The Emma is JPMA certified & meets/exceeds all applicable ASTM and CPSC standards. It is free of phthalates, latex, lead and BPA and its design is ergonomic and stable

PRODUCTS SPECS: The bed dimensions are 56L x 29W x 28H inches. Each chair measures 29L x 29W x 18H while the table is 29L x 14W x8H. Choose any Dream On Me non-toxic, Greenguard certified standard crib mattress for a perfect fit. Max weight limit for the bed -50 lbs
body.description: The award winning Emma 3-in-1 Convertible Bed is an investment that keeps giving! You don’t have to worry about your child getting in and out of bed, thanks to the Emma’s low-to-floor and patented design. It is reinforced for stability with center legs and comes with four wooden safety side rails. Use it as a toddler bed, and when your child outgrows it, it converts easily into two child-sized chairs/sofas and a table that complement any room setting. Little wonder then that it was voted the Best Convertible of 2020 by parenting.com! Conversion kit sold separately. The Emma sports an elegant sleigh design featuring smooth, flowing lines and gentle curves. Built of New Zealand pinewood, it is available in 9 brilliant finishes. Mix and match to create your dream nursery! All our products prioritize safety. The Emma is JPMA certified & meets/exceeds all applicable ASTM and CPSC standards. It is free of phthalates, latex, lead and BPA. The bed dimensions are 56L x 29W x 28H inches. Each chair measures 29L x 29W x 18H while the table is 29L x 14W x 8H. Choose any Dream On Me non-toxic, Greenguard certified standard crib mattress for a perfect fit. Maximum weight limit for the bed is 50 lbs

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Emma 3-in-1 Convertible Toddler Bed Make transition time from a crib to a full-size bed for your child a breeze with the Emma 3-in-1 Convertible Toddler Bed. A low-to-floor design & 4 side safety rails ensure the bed is safe and convenient for your child. Use as a beautiful bed and then convert it into two stylish chairs and a table!
Safe and convenient features that you will fall in love with
The Emma 3-1 Convertible Toddler Bed - A Hit with Parents and Children Alike! Previous page Next page

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this bed. Set up was not as bad as I thought it would be
reviews.reviewText: I love that this bed has the double rails because my child like to move when he sleeps. It’s a great height from the ground that I know he won’t hurt himself getting out. Now I read all of the reviews about set up and honestly it was not as difficult as I thought it was going to be. The instructions were good to me, it does come with an Allen wrench. The instructions said you may need a hammer or screw driver also but I did not. It was time consuming to do but I wanted it done right so I took my time. The quality seems great, very strudy. I would definitely recommend. Ot also does not have shape edges around the opening. I am using a Graco toddler mattress that comes in a box because I did not like the loud water proof cover that’s on the the dream on me mattresses and it fits just fine. Would recommend this toddler bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter loves her new bed! Super cute and sturdy enough for her. Easy to assemble just time consuming since it has so many pieces. Overall very pleased with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars cute for a first transition bed!!
reviews.reviewText: my son was preemie and is very small though being over 2, I've always been scared to transition him from a crib. this toddler bed made me feel like he still has his night time safety while hes small but a little more freedom as well ❤️ excited for the new chapter 🩵

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but a pain to put together
reviews.reviewText: Good luck putting this together. You'll need small fingers to get these bolts into the slots. You'll need to do this with plenty of patience on your side and hours to dive into this. The pieces are not labeled. Only 1 piece was labeled. Same goes for the bolts and screws. The bags they came in were not labeled. Quite honestly, I had to wing it and pull up the picture from Amazon for reference to how it's supposed to look.FYI the pieces needed for the table ARE NOT INCLUDED!The bed is extremely low to the floor which I guess is fine for being a toddler bed easier for them to get into and out of, but it just looks extremely small. If used as chairs and a table, that's where I'd leave a 3-4 star raiding being so low to the floor. Even for a kid it's pretty low.Overall, it does look nice but man was it a pain to put together. Even if it was a terrible quality, you have my money because I am not about to spend hours taking this thing apart 😂Step 1 process for putting the first chair together you also use for step 2, but in reverse. The directions do not tell you this; you just have to figure it out on your own.It's a cute bed. The price for the quality is reasonable. PUT THIS THING TOGETHER WHEN NO ONE IS HOME because your patience will be ran dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: All parts were there and everything fit well. The tool provided for assembly worked well too. Very satisfied!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a decent toddler bed and great price
reviews.reviewText: We got this for our 2 year old son. He loves it! It took about 90 minutes to assemble. Most parts are not labeled but it’s not too difficult to assemble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy transition because of the design..
reviews.reviewText: Since there are rails by the feet as well it mimics a crib in a way making it an easy transition for my son. I used the same crib bumper, sheets, etc. He calls it his "big bed" even though it's the same size. Toddlers are in a toddler size bed for such a short time in their life so im glad this can convert to little chairs. I may use them as dog beds for my two pups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My twins sleep in this. They don’t like to sleep apart from each other and this works perfect as of now !
